posts.title: Customizing the Console Output in Node
posts.summary: Sometimes the plain output of the Console.log is just not enough. Here's all you need to know to get some color in your console!
posts.name: colorful-console.md

posts.title: Building a Markdown-based blog with Vue + Github
posts.summary: So, I've brought back the blog. This time, instead of using a traditional CMS, I decided to hack together my own Markdown-based blog. The twist: The posts are all stored in a repository on Github.
posts.name: building-markdown-blog.md
